The game is quite immersive and sometimes helps in reliving stress! One can play as much as one wants as long as it doesn't become an addiction! overall great game, has its share of hackers and i hope valve is doing whatever it can to make it fair for new and experienced players.
I'd say this game is decent for what it is.
